attributes.action: Strip Liverpool FC of the Premier League title for failing to curb celebrations
attributes.additional_details: In allowing fans to gather outside Anfield (and all across the city), Liverpool FC completely failed to respect both the seriousness and the many victims of the COVID-19 pandemic. I believe they should be stripped of their title as a warning to all clubs to better monitor the behaviour of their fans, especially given the current global climate.
attributes.background: As feared by many since the football season was suspended due to COVID-19, Liverpool FC allowed thousands of fans to congregate outside Anfield after they won the Premier League title. Please consider stripping them of the title as a deterrent to fans of other clubs who may now do the same.
